content: Create a table in markdown format listing out ten essential vitamins and minerals, their primary functions in the human body, and one food source for each.

Sure, here's a table listing ten essential vitamins and minerals, their primary functions, and a food source for each:

| Nutrient       | Primary Function                                       | Food Source                 |
|----------------|--------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------|
| Vitamin A      | Vision, immune function, cell growth                   | Carrots                     |
| Vitamin C      | Collagen synthesis, antioxidant, immune support        | Oranges                     |
| Vitamin D      | Calcium absorption, bone health                        | Fatty fish (like salmon)    |
| Vitamin E      | Antioxidant, cell membrane protection                  | Almonds                     |
| Vitamin K      | Blood clotting, bone metabolism                        | Kale                        |
| Calcium        | Bone health, muscle function, nerve transmission       | Dairy products (milk)       |
| Iron           | Hemoglobin production, oxygen transport                | Red meat                    |
| Magnesium      | Enzyme function, protein synthesis, muscle and nerve function | Spinach                     |
| Potassium      | Fluid balance, nerve signals, muscle contractions      | Bananas                     |
| Zinc           | Immune function, protein synthesis, DNA formation      | Oysters                     |

This table provides a brief overview of some key nutrients, their roles in the body, and where to find them in your diet.
